channel.title: Unreal Tournament 2003/2004
channel.description: Chat about the second generation of Unreal Tournament games, Unreal Tournament 2003 and Unreal Tournament 2004.

item.title: More "Human" Bots
item.author: invalid@example.com (lycheeliang)
item.dc:creator: lycheeliang
item.content:encoded:
http://www.techspot.com/news/50354-custom-ut2004-bots-are-more-human-than-real-life-players.html

Programmers were tasked with the challenge of creating the most human-like UT2004 bots -- and it appears they delivered. In the competition sponsored by 2K games, the top two UT2004 bots tricked 52 percent of the judges into thinking they were guided by flesh and bone. To put that into...

More "Human" Bots

item.title: EDITING: Texture options
item.author: invalid@example.com (Marscaleb)
item.dc:creator: Marscaleb
item.content:encoded:
It's been a while since I've tried to make a UT2K4 map, and I'm getting details confused with other Unreals.

Is it possible to set a texture to render as a nearest filter instead of bilinear? I'm trying to make it look intentionally pixely. Either to change it for the whole game or for an individual texture.

Question two, I don't know what the term is, but is it possible to change like a default scaling for a texture?
Normally when a texture is applied to some BSP, as the default scale...

EDITING: Texture options

item.title: Best weapon in it 2k4
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ebok)
item.dc:creator: Ebok
item.content:encoded:
What do you consider to be the best weapon in Unreal Tournament 2k4?
I am a big fan of the sniper rifle, and shock rifle, but if the redeemer has spawned, I'll go for it.
I love to secondary firming mode on the redeemer where you can guid the missile directly into the enemy's face. I liked the instability rifle in UT99 so much that I would make maps with an Instagram rifle pickup. it was fun when I had the rifle, but it was not fun getting shot repeatedly by the enemy players. Tell me what...

Best weapon in it 2k4

item.title: X-Fi patch and EAX?
item.author: invalid@example.com (GreatEmerald)
item.dc:creator: GreatEmerald
item.content:encoded:
I just realised that the EAX problems I had with UT2004 were actually due to the X-Fi patch breaking it. I find that really odd, I mean, EAX is Creative's product, as is X-Fi and the patch, so why did they break it in the first place?..
Anyway, does anyone know any possible way to get both the X-Fi patch and EAX running at the same time? Or maybe backport the surround sounds in some way? Any info on that would be highly appreciated.

item.title: "Your CD key appears to be invalid.."
item.author: invalid@example.com (Traxis)
item.dc:creator: Traxis
item.content:encoded:
"You will need to reinstall the game and enter your CD key to fix this problem."

This message just appeared out of the blue; everytime I try to run UT2k4, I get this message. It was working not more than 10 minutes ago. The game recently crashed, (I went to play Instant Action, and I selected Assault, and my computer froze up, after I rebooted it didn't work). I looked in the Registry and the CD key listed there is correct. Do I really have to reinstall? If so, do I have to back-up all of...

"Your CD key appears to be invalid.."

item.title: New to UT2004: No servers found?
item.author: invalid@example.com (dyosoft)
item.dc:creator: dyosoft
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone I found out this forum is ut2k4-related, I got the game few days ago and found out I can't play multiplayer, it says "The UT2004 master server could not be reached. Please try again later."

I'm running version 3369, do I need a patch or something? Few years back I was playing the game on my old PC with no problems, did they stopped support? is there a patch to get it back or change the master server?

item.title: UT2K4 problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Reddrag0n)
item.dc:creator: Reddrag0n
item.content:encoded:
UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2004-03-03_02.42]

OS: Windows NT 6.2 (Build: 9200)
CPU: GenuineIntel PentiumPro-class processor @ 3095 MHz with 2047MB RAM
Video: ATI Radeon HD 2400 PRO (1129)

LockRect failed: D3DERR_DEVICELOST

History: UD3DRenderDevice::ReadPixels <- UD3DRenderDevice:resent <- UGameEngine:raw <- UWindowsViewport::Repaint <- UWindowsClient::Tick <- ClientTick <- UGameEngine::Tick <- Level Untitled <- UpdateWorld <- MainLoop

This is the error I got when I try to run ut2004.

item.title: Could someone please create this mutator?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kerr Avon)
item.dc:creator: Kerr Avon
item.content:encoded:
Someone has written a demo of a forthcoming game, called Superhot (stupid, generic name ), you can play it at

http://superhotgame.com/

The thing is, it's a (basic) first person shooter, with one unique point - time only moves when you do. It's probably better for you to try it than for me to describe it, but basically the entire gameworld and everything in it only advances in time when you move or shoot or look around or whatever. When you're not pressing a key (on your...

Could someone please create this mutator?

Thank you.

item.title: Mutator doesn't show up in list after being installed
item.author: invalid@example.com (Thanatosaurus)
item.dc:creator: Thanatosaurus
item.content:encoded:
I extracted the DiesProxyVortexV1 mutator from my cache and installed the INT and UPL files via the command line using

C:\UT2004\System\ucc.exe dumpint mycoolmutator.u

this is for the ucl file
C:\UT2004\System\ucc.exe exportcache mycoolmutator.u
Click to expand...
commands. The UCL and INT files are in the System folder along with the U file now, but the mutator doesn't show up in the list.



I checked in the UT2004.log file and there are no...

Mutator doesn't show up in list after being installed

item.title: Trying to run UnWheel
item.author: invalid@example.com (Gore33)
item.dc:creator: Gore33
item.content:encoded:
(long post)
Hi guys, I am new here.
I've played this mod a long while ago and to my nostalgia, I wanted to try it out again.
I extracted, followed the instructions but when I tried to launch the mod, the game simply went black screen after the Nvidia logo.
When I clicked the ESC key it had 4 options can't remember them correctly: Restart, Exit, Servers and one I don't remember. When I tried restarting, this...

Trying to run UnWheel

item.title: UT2004 X-Fi Patch - Ingame battle sounds missing or skipping!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Morpheus-2396)
item.dc:creator: Morpheus-2396
item.content:encoded:
Hello,

I've installed UT2004 a few days ago after applying a partition image (resetting the System to an earlier state). Everything works fine except 3D sound after installing the Creative UT2004 X-Fi Patch.

BEFORE installing that patch, 3D sound works like it's supposed to be with "HW 3D Audio + EAX" ("Use System Driver" is enabled) in combination with ALchemy.

AFTER installing the X-Fi Patch, some ingame sounds (shots, death screams) are not being played anymore...

UT2004 X-Fi Patch - Ingame battle sounds missing or skipping!

item.title: UT2004 CTF 5V5 CUP REGISTERATION
item.author: invalid@example.com (exod1a)
item.dc:creator: exod1a
item.content:encoded:
How to register :
1 - Register to TEAMATCH.NET website , Link: http://teamatch.net/register.php
2 - Register to the FORUM , Link: http://teamatch.net/forum/register.php
3 - Post ur nick that u registered with (to teamatch.net) in the POST COMMENTS at link below:

http://teamatch.net/forum/showthread.php?39-REGISTERATION-League-UT2004-CTF-5V5-DRAFT
